ns.description: Property.  Namespace to place this object in... used in conjunction with id to create a unique name for the object

id.description: Property.  object ID useful in conjunction with the namespace for manipulating and deleting the object later

action.description: Property.  0 add/modify an object, 1 (deprecated), 2 deletes an object, 3 deletes all objects

scale.description: Property.  Scale of the object 1,1,1 means default (usually 1 meter square)

lifetime.description: Property.  How long the object should last before being automatically deleted. 0 means forever

frame_locked.description: Property.  If this marker should be frame-locked, i.e. retransformed into its frame every timestep

text.description: Property.  NOTE: only used for text markers

mesh_resource.description: Property.  NOTE: only used for MESH_RESOURCE markers
